validation set.to use: constant learning rate or learning rate annealing

Grid search.from sentence: Grid search was performed using 20 % of the training data as a validation set in order to determine the optimal hyperparameters as well as whether to use a constant learning rate or learning rate annealing .

optimal learning rate.from sentence: The optimal learning rate in the case of cosine similarity is extremely small , suggesting a chaotic error surface .

of.from sentence: The weights of the networks were initialized from a uniform distribution in the range of [ - 0.001 , 0.001 ] .

tune.from sentence: We did however tune the number of iterations from , learning rate from [ 0.25 , 0.025 , 0.0025 , 0.001 ] and ? from .

L2 regularized dot product.from sentence: In the case of using L2 regularized dot product , ? ( regularization strength ) was chosen from [ 1 , 0.1 , 0.01 ] .

larger number of epochs.from sentence: The model in turn requires a larger number of epochs for convergence .

distribution.from sentence: For the distribution for sampling negative words , we used the n-gram distribution raised to the 3 / 4 th power in accordance with .
